snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry will attend climate talks in Lima, Peru, to encourage countries to strike an agreement on reducing carbon emissions.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry will arrive at United Nations climate change summit in Peru to strongly urge negotiators to reach a deal; typically, secretary of state would not join diplomatic negotiations at this level but Kerry has made climate change priority of his tenure.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry will attend climate talks in Lima, Peru, to encourage countries to strike an agreement on reducing carbon emissions.

headline.main: Kerry Plans to Attend Climate Talks
headline.print_headline: Kerry Plans to Attend Climate Talks
